title: Create User Authentication
description: Implement user authentication with JWT, including signup, login, and password reset.

title: Design Homepage Layout
description: Create a responsive layout for the homepage using CSS Grid and Flexbox.

title: Set Up MongoDB Schema
description: Create the MongoDB schema for the application, including necessary relations.

title: Implement API Endpoints for CRUD Operations
description: Develop RESTful API endpoints for creating, reading, updating, and deleting task items.

title: Develop Task List Frontend Component
description: Build the React/Vue/Angular component for displaying and managing the list of tasks.

title: Write Unit Tests for Authentication
description: Create comprehensive unit tests for all user authentication functions (signup, login, etc.).

title: Configure CI/CD Pipeline
description: Set up a Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment pipeline using GitHub Actions or GitLab CI.

title: Optimize Database Queries
description: Review and optimize slow-running database queries to improve application performance.

title: Integrate Third-Party Logging Service
description: Set up and integrate a logging service like Winston or Pino for server-side error tracking.

title: Create Mobile Responsive Navigation Bar
description: Develop a responsive navigation bar that adapts correctly to mobile devices (e.g., a hamburger menu).

title: Refactor Error Handling Middleware
description: Standardize and centralize error handling logic across all API routes using middleware.

title: Document API Usage in Swagger/OpenAPI
description: Generate or manually write comprehensive API documentation using Swagger/OpenAPI specification.

title: Conduct Security Audit on Dependencies
description: Scan and review all project dependencies for known security vulnerabilities and apply necessary patches/updates.

title: Create User Profile Management Screen
description: Develop the frontend component allowing users to view and update their profile information (name, email, password).

title: Set Up Database Backup Strategy
description: Configure automated daily backups for the MongoDB database and define a restore procedure.

title: Implement Client-Side Form Validation
description: Add robust client-side validation to all input forms (login, signup, task creation) to enhance user experience.

title: Design Application Logo and Favicon
description: Create a simple, modern logo and favicon for branding the application interface.

title: Integrate Email Notification Service
description: Connect the application to a transactional email service (e.g., SendGrid) for sending task reminders.

title: Write E2E Tests for Core Workflow
description: Develop End-to-End tests using Cypress or Playwright covering the signup, login, and task creation workflow.

title: Configure Environment Variables
description: Securely set up and manage environment variables for development, staging, and production environments.

title: Add Filtering and Sorting to Task List
description: Implement functionality on the frontend to filter tasks by status and priority, and sort by due date.

title: Review and Optimize Bundling (Webpack/Vite)
description: Analyze the final build output and configure the bundler to minimize size and improve load times.

title: Internationalization (i18n) Setup
description: Configure the framework to support multiple languages and create initial translation files for English and Spanish.

title: Implement 'Forgot Password' Flow
description: Develop the backend logic and frontend UI for sending a password reset link via email and handling the token validation.

title: Add Task Commenting Feature
description: Implement a sub-schema in MongoDB to store comments associated with each task and build the corresponding UI component.

title: Set Up HTTPS and Domain Configuration
description: Obtain an SSL certificate (e.g., Let's Encrypt) and configure the server/proxy (Nginx/Apache) to use HTTPS for the production domain.

title: Create Dashboard Analytics View
description: Design and implement a simple dashboard showing key metrics like 'Tasks by Status' and 'Tasks overdue'.

title: Develop Task Archiving Functionality
description: Add an option for users to archive (soft-delete) completedd tasks and a separate view to see archived items.

title: Implement Rate Limiting on API
description: Apply server-side rate limiting to prevent abuse on public endpoints like login and signup.

title: Perform Cross-Browser Compatibility Check
description: Test the application layout and functionality on major browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge).

title: Upgrade Dependencies to Latest Stable Versions
description: Review the 'package.json'/'requirements.txt' and update all major dependencies while ensuring no breaking changes occur.

title: Create Onboarding Tutorial/Walkthrough
description: Develop a simple, interactive tutorial for new users explaining the core features of the task application.

title: Implement Image Upload for Task Attachments
description: Set up storage (e.g., S3 or local file system) and API endpoints to allow users to attach images to tasks.
